AI caption: **Type of image:** Photo
**Main components:** Solar inverter with display, UNO enclosure, and PV DC disconnect switch.
**Technical details:** ABB logo, UNO, PV DC Disconnect.

Additional highlights
− RS-485 communication interface (for
connection to laptop or data logger)
− Available with the optional VSN300
Wifi Logger Card for easy and
affordable wireless monitoring
− Compliant with NEC 690.12 when
OFF ON
used with ABB‘s Rapid Shutdown
device
− Comes standard with DC Arc Fault
Circuit Interruptor (AFCI) to comply
with NEC 690.11
